faqs.answer: Key legal requirements include the final Registered Sale Deed or Conveyance Deed, a comprehensive Title Report verifying clear ownership history, the latest Mutation Extract, and importantly all necessary No-Objection Certificates and approvals from the Town and Country Planning department.
